articles.author: Pauline Lockwood, Maija-Liisa Ehlinger
articles.title: ‘They saved their whole lives for this’: American woman’s heartbreak as parents die on Hajj - CNN
articles.description: What was supposed to be the trip of a lifetime turned tragic this week when Saida Wurie learned her parents were among the hundreds of pilgrims who have died amid extreme temperatures in Saudi Arabia.
articles.content:
Saida Wurie said it was her parents lifelong dream to participate in Hajj, the religious pilgrimage that brings Muslims from around the world to Saudi Arabia each year.
Theyd spent $23,000 on an all… [+5156 chars]

articles.title: JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America and Citibank Flagged for Holding Trillions of Dollars in Derivatives Without Proper Contingency Plans: Report - The Daily Hodl
articles.description: US regulators are flagging JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Citibank and Goldman Sachs over the banks' contingency plans for trillions of dollars in derivatives.
articles.content:
